original_text:
Dolphin’s Pearl
Caratteristiche generali
Software: Novomatic
Rulli: 5
Linee di vincita: 9
Puntata min.: 0,40 €
Puntata max.: 20 €
Autoplay: si

Tema e grafica
Quello marino è un tema senza dubbio molto popolare nelle slot machine, e in questo gioco nato dalla casa madre Novomatic, si ha proprio la sensazione di immergersi nella profondità del mare in mezzo alle creature che lo popolano.
La grafica è veramente bella e molto curata e, nonostante questa slot sia presente online da oltre dieci anni, non perde il suo fascino e compete per definizione ed effetti speciali con le slot di ultima generazione.

Simboli e Wild
I simboli legati al mondo sottomarino sono rappresentati da ostriche, perle, aragoste e cavallucci marini.
Ad affiancare i simboli a tema troviamo le classiche carte da gioco, dal 9 all’asso.
Il simbolo Wild è rappresentato dal delfino, protagonista assoluto del gioco, che quando appare può sostituire qualsiasi altro simbolo, al fine di determinare una combinazione vincente.
L’ostrica con la perla invece, è lo Scatter, e offre la possibilità di moltiplicare le vincite durante i giri gratuiti.

Come si gioca a Dolphin’s Pearl?
Questa slot ha cinque rulli e presenta nove linee di pagamento, anziché le dieci che troviamo nella gran parte delle slot firmate dalla tedesca Novomatic.
Il gioco è semplice, ma presenta delle funzionalità interessanti che permettono di incrementare le vincite.
La vincita massima si ha quando si ha con un allineamento di cinque delfini.
Il simbolo Scatter, l’ostrica con la perla al suo interno, quando appare in numero superiore a tre, regala ben 15 giri gratuiti in cui tutte le vincite sono triplicate.
Questa slot machine ha un RTP, ossa un return to player, del 94,24%.
Cosa significa questo valore? L’RTP corrisponde alla percentuale di vincita in teoria, ossia la percentuale dell’importo che il giocatore ha puntato e che potrebbe essergli corrisposta nuovamente.
Slot simili a Dolphin
Il tema marino non è una novità sia nelle slot machine che nelle VLT, ed è stato ampiamente sviluppato da diverse software house.
Una versione molto avventurosa di questa tematica è Sea Hunter, firmata Play’n GO, in cui il gioco si muove nella profondità degli abissi, alle prese con terribili orche assassine e ogni varietà di pesce.
Se invece si vuole accostare il mondo sommerso con la storia, IGT propone King of Atlantis, in cui la storia della città perduta di Atlantide è arricchita dai protagonisti della mitologia greca e romana, con in testa Poseidone in persona!
Per chi ama il tema marino ma non è attratto dalle slot troppo appariscenti e predilige una grafica lineare, ricordiamo Big Catch, sempre della tedesca Novomatic, che offre un’esperienza di gioco molto colorata e divertente.

raw_translation.response:
Dolphin's Pearl
General Features
Software: Novomatic
Reels: 5
Paylines: 9
Minimum bet: €0.40
Maximum bet: €20
Autoplay: Yes

Theme and Graphics
The marine theme is undoubtedly very popular in slot machines, and in this game from the Novomatic mother company, you really feel like diving into the depths of the sea among the creatures that populate it.
The graphics are truly beautiful and well-crafted, and even though this slot has been online for more than ten years, it does not lose its charm and competes in definition and special effects with the latest generation slots.

Symbols and Wild
Symbols related to the underwater world are represented by oysters, pearls, lobsters, and seahorses.
Alongside the theme symbols we find the classic playing cards from 9 to Ace.
The Wild symbol is represented by the dolphin, the absolute protagonist of the game, which when it appears can replace any other symbol to determine a winning combination.
The oyster with the pearl is the Scatter symbol, and offers the opportunity to multiply winnings during free spins.

How to play Dolphin's Pearl?
This slot has five reels and features nine paylines, instead of the ten found in most slots signed by the German Novomatic.
The game is simple but has interesting features that allow you to increase your winnings.
The maximum win is obtained with an alignment of five dolphins.
The Scatter symbol, the oyster with the pearl inside, when it appears in more than three numbers, gives 15 free spins in which all winnings are tripled.
This slot machine has an RTP, which is a return to player, of 94.24%.
What does this value mean? The RTP corresponds to the percentage of theoretical winnings, that is, the percentage of the amount the player has bet and that could be returned to him.
Slots similar to Dolphin
The marine theme is not a novelty in both slot machines and VLTs, and has been widely developed by different software houses.
A very adventurous version of this theme is Sea Hunter, signed by Play'n GO, where the game moves in the depths of the abyss, facing terrible killer whales and every variety of fish.
If, on the other hand, you want to combine the underwater world with history, IGT proposes King of Atlantis, where the story of the lost city of Atlantis is enriched by the protagonists of Greek and Roman mythology, with Poseidon himself leading the way!
For those who love the marine theme but are not attracted to too flashy slots and prefer linear graphics, we remember Big Catch, also from the German Novomatic, which offers a very colorful and fun gaming experience.

The game takes you on an underwater adventure, where you can encounter creatures like oysters, pearls, lobsters, seahorses, and of course, dolphins. This marine-themed slot game offers simple gameplay that can help you increase your winnings.

Gameplay and features

Dolphin’s Pearl offers a straightforward gameplay experience with exciting features. The game has five reels and nine paylines, with a maximum win that is obtained when aligning five dolphins. The Wild symbol, represented by the dolphin, can replace any other symbol to determine a winning combination. Additionally, the Scatter symbol, the oyster with the pearl inside, gives 15 free spins in which all winnings are tripled when appearing in more than three numbers. The game also features an Autoplay option that allows players to relax and enjoy the gameplay without having to spin the reels manually continuously.

Symbols and graphics

The symbols in Dolphin's Pearl reflect the underwater world and include oysters, pearls, lobsters, and seahorses alongside classic playing cards from 9 to Ace. The graphics are well-crafted, and the game provides you with an immersive underwater experience that doesn't lose its charm over time. The dolphin symbol, the Wild, is the game’s protagonist and visually stunning. The oyster with the pearl, on the other hand, is the Scatter symbol, providing players with opportunities to increase their winnings.

Similar games

If you enjoy the marine theme, Dolphin’s Pearl might be the perfect slot game for you. However, if you’re looking for other marine-themed slot options, there are other games worth exploring. One such game is Sea Hunter, signed by Play’n GO, offering an adventurous version of the marine theme that is set in the abyss, where you'll encounter killer whales and every variety of fish. Another option is King of Atlantis by IGT, which combines the underwater world with Greek and Roman mythology and the story of the lost city of Atlantis, led by Poseidon himself. Lastly, for those who prefer a linear graphic and a simple interface, Big Catch from Novomatic is an excellent game that offers a colorful and fun gaming experience.

RTP

Dolphin’s Pearl has an RTP of 94.24%, meaning that the theoretical payout percentage for this slot game overall is 94.24%. This percentage indicates the percentage of the amount that a player has wagered and could potentially be returned to them over the long run. With this RTP, Dolphin’s Pearl offers players an excellent chance of winning when playing this marine-themed slot game.
